snippet.title: Spinch | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Nintendo eShop: https://bit.ly/2EbT94z
Steam: https://bit.ly/3l5Dm8c
GoG: https://www.gog.com/game/spinch
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/spinch

Original Soundtrack by James Kirkpatrick aka Thesis Sahib.  Listen Now: https://materia.to/spinch

Spinch is a visual 2D platformer created by award winning Canadian cartoonist Jesse Jacobs, developed by Queen Bee Games, with audio composition by famed Canadian artist Thesis Sahib (James Kirkpatrick).

Spinch is a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring from an endless kaleidoscopic invasion of misshapen and malformed offbeats and oddities.  Dash, dodge, jump, and even launch your own children as projectiles to take down six eccentric bosses in six vibrant worlds.

For more information, visit:

Spinch The Game
►Social Media Links: http://linktr.ee/spinch

Jesse Jacobs
►Website: https://www.jessejacobsart.com
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/je55ejacobs
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jacobs_comics

►Website: http://www.jameskirkpatrick.org/
►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/james.kirkpa...
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/thesissahib
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jamestkirkp...

Queen Bee Games
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/queenbeegames
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/queenbeegames/
►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/QueenBeeGames
►Tumblr: https://spinchthegame.tumblr.com/

Akupara Games
►Social Media Links: https://linktr.ee/akuparagames
